plot: When Ida learns about the death of a close friend on her 85th birthday, she decides to throw a party for the ages -- well, the aged -- while her overbearing daughter expects her over for a birthday dinner.
title: Ida's 85th
plot_es: When Ida learns about the death of a close friend on her 85th birthday, she decides to throw a party for the ages -- well, the aged -- while her overbearing daughter expects her over for a birthday dinner.
plot_en: When Ida learns about the death of a close friend on her 85th birthday, she decides to throw a party for the ages -- well, the aged -- while her overbearing daughter expects her over for a birthday dinner.
